name: EvoBlaze
description:
THIS IS A SCHOOL PROJECT

Evoblaze is a tycoon-building game where the player must build an industry to gain more money and destroy the world. The goal of the game is to destroy the world by increasing the CO2/Emission rates. The player will encounter challenges where an event will randomly generate. These events will include, an increase in taxes (decreasing the income of the player), a fine (paying a set amount), environmental rallies (damaging buildings or demanding change). 

Controls: 

Camera movement: W, S, A, D

Camera zoom: Scroll wheel, Z, X

Goal get to 460 Co2 to win.
